tgt_original: tadanukramaśo nāḍīcakraṁ naṅkṣyati,  kṣiterjaladhātau vilīnatvāt śarīraṁ pūrvāpekṣayā jīrṇatvamupayāti kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ pādau ca śarīramutthāpayitumasamarthā bhaviṣyanti |
bhaviṣyati |  etadagre hṛdayanāḍīcakraṁ kṣeṣyati,  jaladhātoragnidhātau layo bhaviṣyati |
tadānīmābhyantaracitte dhūmābhāsaḥ tadanu ca kaṇṭhanāḍīcakra-vināśaḥ agnighātorvāyudhātau layaśca sampatsyate |
bahirvastuparijñāne ca asāmarthyaṁ syāt |  tataśca guhyanāḍicakraṁ naṅkṣyati,  vāyuśca vijñāne vileṣyati |
